name: Daily Tone-Up Vitamin Cica Sunscreen
description: A lightweight sunscreen with Vitamin C and Cica that brightens, soothes, and protects skin from UV rays while providing a natural tone-up effect.

name: Lois Chloe Sunscreen Cream SPF Protection
description: A hydrating sunscreen cream that shields skin from harmful UV rays while nourishing and keeping it soft, smooth, and naturally radiant all day.

name: Neogence UV Defense Hydrating Sunscreen
description: A lightweight, hydrating sunscreen that protects against UVA/UVB rays while keeping skin moisturized, smooth, and radiant without a greasy feel.

name: Guerniss Everyday Protection Lotion
description: A lightweight, non-greasy lotion that hydrates and protects skin from environmental damage, keeping it soft, smooth, and nourished all day long.

name: Nior Aqua Splash Sunscreen
description: A lightweight, water-resistant sunscreen that hydrates and protects skin from UV rays, leaving a fresh, non-greasy finish for all-day defense.

name: Eucerin Oil Control Sunscreen
description: A mattifying, lightweight sunscreen with SPF protection that controls excess oil, reduces shine, and helps prevent sun-induced skin damage.

name: HeedBeauty Sunscreen SPF 50
description: A lightweight, non-greasy sunscreen that provides broad-spectrum protection, hydrates the skin, and prevents sun damage for a radiant, healthy glow.

name: Weightless Full Cover Fit Foundation
description: A high-coverage, lightweight foundation that blends seamlessly, providing a flawless, natural matte finish while keeping skin hydrated and breathable.

name: I Love Extreme Volume Mascara
description: A high-impact mascara that delivers intense volume and bold, dramatic lashes with a deep black formula, ensuring long-lasting, smudge-proof wear.

name: Beauti4me Matte Finish Primer
description: A lightweight primer that controls oil, minimizes pores, and creates a smooth matte finish, ensuring a flawless, long-lasting makeup look.

name: Beauti4me Light Beige Concealer Stick
description: A smooth, lightweight concealer that hides dark circles, blemishes, and imperfections while providing a natural, long-lasting finish.

name: Beauti4me VD Brown Matte Lipstick
description: A richly pigmented brown matte lipstick that glides smoothly, delivering long-lasting, comfortable wear with a bold, velvety finish

name: Everly Beauties Blush & Sculpt Kit
description: A versatile blush and contour kit that enhances your natural glow, adding warmth and dimension for a sculpted, radiant complexion all day long.

name: Essence Lash Princess Mascara
description: This mascara lifts, lengthens, and defines for bold, long-lasting eye makeup.

name: Bote Makeup Instyle Matte Powder 04
description: A lightweight matte powder that controls shine, blurs imperfections, and provides a smooth, flawless finish for a long-lasting, natural look.
